thoughts.text: I agree with the plan. Using rsync with the --exclude option and adding the -a option to preserve file attributes and permissions is a better approach than using cp. The plan also includes removing the original files after the copy operation, which is a good practice.
thoughts.speak: I suggest using the rsync command with the --exclude option and adding the -a option to preserve file attributes and permissions. The plan also includes removing the original files after the copy operation, which is a good practice.
